org.bounswe.digest.api.database

Class ChannelJDBC

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bounswe.digest.api.database.ChannelJDBC

  • public class ChannelJDBC
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles database transactions about topic channels.
    Author:
    Kerim Gokarslan, Ozan Bulut
